arien.name: Noble Blade
arien.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
Before the attack: You may move another
unit that is adjacent to the target 1 space.
~("Another unit" never includes you.)

arien.name: Ceremonial Blade
arien.description:
Target a hero adjacent to you.
Before the attack: You may move a minion
that is adjacent to the target 1 space.

arien.name: Spell Break
arien.description:
**This turn:** Enemy heroes in radius cannot
perform skill actions, except on gold cards.
~(Skill ::skill_silver:: is an action type. Other action types are unaffected.)

arien.name: Living Tsunami
arien.description:
Once per turn, before performing an
Attack action, you may move 1 space.

arien.name: Aspiring Duelist
arien.description:
Ignore all minion defense modifiers.
~(This includes your minions, as well as the enemy minions.)

arien.name: Dangerous Current
arien.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. Before the
attack: Up to 1 enemy hero in any of the
2 spaces in a straight line directly behind
the target discards a card, or is defeated.

arien.name: Liquid Leap
arien.description:
Place yourself into a space in range
without a spawn point and not adjacent
to an empty spawn point.

arien.name: Expert Duelist
arien.description:
Ignore all minion defense modifiers.
**This turn:** You are immune to attack actions
of all enemy heroes, except this attacker.

arien.name: Rogue Wave
arien.description:
Target a unit in range.
After the attack: You may an enemy
unit adjacent to you up to 2 spaces.

arien.name: Magical Current
arien.description:
Place yourself into a space in range
without a spawn point and not adjacent
to an empty spawn point.

arien.name: Slippery Ground
arien.description:
**This turn:** Enemies heroes adjacent
to you cannot fast travel, or move more
than 1 space with a movement action.

arien.name: Raging Stream
arien.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. Before the
attack: Up to 1 enemy hero in any of the
3 spaces in a straight line directly behind
the target discards a card, or is defeated.

arien.name: Arcane Whirlpool
arien.description:
Swap with an enemy minion in range.
~(Swap places with the target. This is not movement.)

arien.name: Master Duelist
arien.description:
Ignore all minion defense modifiers.
**This round:** You are immune to attack actions
of all enemy heroes, except this attacker.

arien.name: Violent Torrent
arien.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. Before the
attack: Up to 1 enemy hero in any of the 5
spaces in a straight line directly behind the
target discards a card, or is defeated.
May repeat once on a different unit.

arien.name: Stranger Tide
arien.description:
Place yourself into a space in
range without a spawn point.

arien.name: Deluge
arien.description:
**This turn:** Enemies in radius
cannot fast travel, or move more than
1 space with a movement action.

arien.name: Tidal Blast
arien.description:
Target a unit in range.
After the attack: You may push an enemy
unit adjacent to you up to 3 spaces.

arien.name: Ebb and Flow
arien.description:
Swap with aan enemy minion in range;
if it was adjacent to you, may repeact once.

bain.name: Dead or Alive
bain.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: You may give an enemy
hero in radius the ::marker_bounty:: Bounty marker.
A hero with the Bounty marker spends
1 additional ::life_counters:: life counter when defeated.

bain.name: Side Quest
bain.description:
If you are adjacent to an enemy unit,
give a hero in radius a ::marker_bounty:: Bounty marker.
A hero with the Bounty marker spends
1 additional ::life_counters:: life counter when defeated.

bain.name: Get over here!
bain.description:
Target a unit or a token in range and in a
straight line, with no obstacles between you
and the target. Move that target towards you
in a straight line, until you are adjacent.

bain.name: A Complicated Profession
bain.description:
After you give a hero the ::marker_bounty:: Bounty marker,
that hero discards a card.

bain.name: A Game of Chance
bain.description:
An enemy hero in radius with two or more
cards in hand chooses one of those cards.
Guess that card's color, then reveal it.
If you guessed correctly, discard that card;
otherwise you gain 1 coin.
~(You can only guess colors that could be in that player's hand.)

bain.name: Light Crossbow
bain.description:
Target a unit in range and in a straight line
with no other units or terrain between you.

bain.name: Close Call
bain.description:
If the hero in play has a ::marker_bounty:: Bounty marker,
block the attack and that hero
gives the marker to you.
~(The marker's effect is applied to you.)

bain.name: Dead Man's Hand
bain.description:
An enemy hero in radius with two or more
cards in hand chooses one of those cards.
Guess that card's color, then reveal it.
If you guessed correctly, discard that card;
otherwise you gain 2 coins.

bain.name: Heavy Crossbow
bain.description:
Target a unit in range and in a straight line
with no units or terrain between you.

bain.name: Narrow Escape
bain.description:
If the hero in play has a ::marker_bounty:: Bounty marker,
block the attack and retrieve the marker.

bain.name: Drinking Buddies
bain.description:
You may have a hero in radius retrieve a
discarded card. If they do, you may
also retrieve a discarded card.

bain.name: Hand Crossbow
bain.description:
**Choose one ΓÇö**
>>Target a hero in range with
>a ::marker_bounty:: Bounty marker.
>>Target a hero adjacent to you.

bain.name: Vantage Point
bain.description:
Ignore obstacles. If a hero in play has
a ::marker_bounty:: Bounty marker, +1 ::movement_green:: movement.

bain.name: We're Not Done Yet!
bain.description:
An enemy hero in radius with two or more
cards in hand chooses one of those cards.
Guess that card's color, then reveal it.
If you guessed correctly, discard that card;
otherwise may repeat once or gain 2 coins.

bain.name: Arbalest
bain.description:
Target a unit in range and in a straight line
with no units or terrain between you.

bain.name: Perfect Getaway
bain.description:
If the hero in play has a ::marker_bounty:: Bounty marker,
block the attack.

bain.name: Another One!
bain.description:
You may have a hero in radius retrieve a
discarded card. If they do, you may
also retrieve a discarded card.
**End of turn:** May repeat once.

bain.name: Hunter-Seeker
bain.description:
**Choose one, or both,** on different targets ΓÇö
>>Target a hero in range with
>a ::marker_bounty:: Bounty marker.
>>Target a hero adjacent to you.

bain.name: High Ground
bain.description:
Ignore obstacles. If a hero in play has
a ::marker_bounty:: Bounty marker, +2 ::movement_green:: movement.

brogan.name: Onslaught
brogan.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. After the attack:
Move into the space it occupied, if able.

brogan.name: Leap Forward
brogan.description:
Target a hero adjacent to you. After the attack:
Move into the space it occupied, if able.

brogan.name: Bulwark
brogan.description:
You may retrieve a discarded card.
**This turn:** You and friendly units in radius
cannot be moved, pushed, swapped
or placed by enemy heroes.

brogan.name: One Man Army
brogan.description:
During minion battle you count as a heavy
minion; if you would be removed,
lose the push instead.

brogan.name: Brutal Jab
brogan.description:
You may move 1 space. Push an enemy unit
or a token adjacent to you up to 1 space.

brogan.name: Mad Dash
brogan.description:
Before the attack: Move 2 spaces
in a straight line to a space adjacent to
an enemy unit, then target that unit.
~(If you cannot make this move, you cannot attack.)

brogan.name: Shield
brogan.description:
**This round:** When any friendly minion in radius
is defeated you may discard a silver card.
If you do, the minion is not removed.
~(The enemy hero still gains the coins for defeating the minion.)

brogan.name: Mighty Punch
brogan.description:
You may move 1 space. Push an enemy unit
or a token adjacent to you up to 2 spaces.

brogan.name: Bullrush
brogan.description:
Before the attack: Move 2 or 3 spaces in
a straight line to a space adjacent to an
enemy unit, then target that unit.

brogan.name: Bolster
brogan.description:
**This round:** When any friendly minion in radius
is defeated you may discard a silver card.
If you do, the minion is not removed.

brogan.name: Shield Bash
brogan.description:
An enemy hero adjacent to you who
has played an attack card this turn
discards a card, if able.

brogan.name: Throwing Axe
brogan.description:
**Choose one ΓÇö**
>>Target a hero adjacent to you.
>>You may discard a card;
if you do, target a unit in range.

brogan.name: War Drummer
Savage Kick
brogan.description:
Move up to 2 spaces. Push an enemy unit
or a token adjacent to you up to 2 spaces.

brogan.name: Furious Charge
brogan.description:
Before the attack: Move 2, 3 or 4 spaces
in a straight line to a space adjacent to an
enemy unit, then target that unit.

brogan.name: Fortify
brogan.description:
**This round:** When any friendly minion in radius
is defeated you may discard a basic card.
If you do, the minion is not removed.

brogan.name: Counterattack
brogan.description:
An enemy hero adjacent to you who
has played an attack card this turn
discards a card, or is defeated.

brogan.name: Throwing Spear
brogan.description:
**Choose one ΓÇö**
>>Target a hero adjacent to you.
>>You may discard a card. If you have a card
in the discard, target a unit in range.

brogan.name: Master Skald

cutter.name: Walk the Plank
cutter.description:
**Choose one ΓÇö**
>>Push an enemy hero adjacent to you
>up to 4 spaces; if that hero is pushed
>into another zone, that hero discards
>a card, or is defeated.
>>Defeat a minion adjacent to you.

cutter.name: Few More Steps
cutter.description:
Push an enemy hero adjacent to you
up to 3 spaces; if that hero is pushed
into another zone, that hero discards
a card, or is defeated.

cutter.name: Grappling Bolt
cutter.description:
Target an obstacle in range and in a straight
line, with no obstacles between you; ignore
immunity. Move in a straight line towards
that obstacle until you are adjacent to it.

cutter.name: Legend of the Skies
cutter.description:
The first time each turn after you perform a
primary action, you may perform the primary
action of a card in the previous turn slot.

cutter.name: Bombardment
cutter.description:
A enemy hero in radius, adjacent to
another enemy unit and not adjacent
to you, discards a card, if able.

cutter.name: Daring Strike
cutter.description:
**Choose one ΓÇö**
>> Before the attack: Move 1 space.
Target a unit adjacent to you in the
direction of the move; +2 ::attack_red:: Attack.
>> Target a unit adjacent to you.

cutter.name: Brace for Impact
cutter.description:
Move 3 spaces in a straight line, ignoring
obstacles, to a space adjacent to an enemy
hero; that hero discards a card, if able.

cutter.name: Barrage
cutter.description:
A enemy hero in radius, adjacent to
another enemy unit and not adjacent
to you, discards a card, if able.

cutter.name: Bold Thrust
cutter.description:
**Choose one ΓÇö**
>> Before the attack: Move 1 or 2 spaces in a
straight line. Target a unit adjacent to you
in the direction of the move; +2 ::attack_red:: Attack.
>> Target a unit adjacent to you.

cutter.name: Ramming Speed
cutter.description:
Move 3 or 4 spaces in a straight line, ignoring
obstacles, to a space adjacent to an enemy
hero; that hero discards a card, if able.

cutter.name: X Marks the Spot
cutter.description:
An enemy hero in radius **chooses one ΓÇö**
>> You place that hero in a space in radius.
>> You gain 2 coins.

cutter.name: Evasive Shot
cutter.description:
Target a unit in range in a straight line
After the attack: Move up to 2 spaces
in the opposite direction.

cutter.name: Outmaneuver
cutter.description:
Swap with an enemy minion in radius;
you may move that minion up to 2 spaces.

cutter.name: Broadside
cutter.description:
A enemy hero in radius, adjacent to
another enemy unit and not adjacent
to you, discards a card, if able.
May repeat once on a different target.

cutter.name: Fearless Lunge
cutter.description:
**Choose one ΓÇö**
>> Before the attack: Move 1, 2 or 3 spaces in
>a straight line. Target a unit adjacent to you
>in the direction of the move; +2 ::attack_red:: Attack.
>> Target a unit adjacent to you.

cutter.name: Crashland
cutter.description:
Move 3, 4 or 5 spaces in a straight line,
ignoring obstacles, to a space adjacent to an
enemy hero; that hero discards a card, if able.

cutter.name: A Fistful of Coins
cutter.description:
An enemy hero in radius **chooses one ΓÇö**
>> You place that hero in a space in radius.
>> You gain 3 coins. If you have 13 or more
>coins, you alone win the game.

cutter.name: Tumble Shot
cutter.description:
Target a unit in range in a straight line.
After the attack: Move up to 3 spaces
in the opposite direction.

cutter.name: Outsmart
cutter.description:
Swap with an enemy minion in radius;
you may move that minion up to 3 spaces.

dodger.name: Dread Razor
dodger.description:
**Choose one ΓÇö**
>>Target a unit adjacent to you.
>>If you are adjacent to an empty spawn point
>in the battle zone, target a unit in range.

dodger.name: Rusty Razor
dodger.description:
**Choose one ΓÇö**
>>Target a hero adjacent to you.
>>If you are adjacent to an empty spawn point
>in the battle zone, target a hero in range.

dodger.name: Death Trap
dodger.description:
An enemy hero in radius who is
adjacent to an empty spawn point in
the battle zone, discards a card, if able.

dodger.name: Tide of Darkness
dodger.description:
While you are performing an action, all spaces
count as if they are in the battle zone and
havd a friendly minion spawn point.

dodger.name: Shield of Decay
dodger.description:
+2 ::defense_blue:: Defense if there are 2 or more empty
spawn points in radius in the battle zone.

dodger.name: Littlefinger of Death
dodger.description:
**Choose one ΓÇö**
>>Target a hero adjacent to you.
>>Target a hero in range who has one or
>more cards in the discard.

dodger.name: Dark Ritual
dodger.description:
If there are 2 or more empty spawn points
in radius in the battle zone, gain 1 coin.

dodger.name: Vampiric Shield
dodger.description:
+2 ::defense_blue:: Defense if there are 2 or more empty
minion spawn points in radius in the battle zone.

dodger.name: Finger of Death
dodger.description:
**Choose one ΓÇö**
>>Target a hero adjacent to you.
>>Target a hero in range who has one or
>more cards in the discard.

dodger.name: Darker Ritual
dodger.description:
If there are 2 or more empty spawn points
in radius in the battle zone, gain 2 coins.

dodger.name: Weakness
dodger.description:
**This turn:** Enemy heroes
in radius have -4 ::attack_silver:: Attack.
~(They can still attack, even with a negative attack value.)

dodger.name: Burning Skull
dodger.description:
Target a unit in range. After the attack:
Move up to 1 minion adjacent to you
1 space, to a space not adjacent to you.

dodger.name: Necromancy
dodger.description:
Respawn a friendly minion in an empty friendly
spawn point adjacent to you in the battle zone.

dodger.name: Aegis of Doom
dodger.description:
+4 ::defense_blue:: if there are 2 or more empty
spawn points in radius in a battle zone.

dodger.name: Middlefinger of Death
dodger.description:
**Choose one, or both, on different targets ΓÇö**
>>Target a hero adjacent to you.
>>Target a hero in range who has one or 
>more cards in the discard.

dodger.name: Darkest Ritual
dodger.description:
If there are 2 or more empty spawn points in
radius in the battle zone, gain 2 coins. If you
have your Ultimate, gain an ::attack_silver:: Attack item.
~(Use any spare card from the box with the corresponding icon.)

dodger.name: Enfeeblement
dodger.description:
**This turn:** Enemy heroes in radius have
-6 ::attack_silver:: Attack and cannot repeat actions.

dodger.name: Blazing Skull
dodger.description:
Target a unit in range. After the attack:
Move up to 2 minions adjacent to you
1 space each, to spaces not adjacent to you.

dodger.name: Necromastery
dodger.description:
Respawn a friendly minion in an empty friendly
spawn point in radius in the battle zone.

garrus.name: Angry Strike
garrus.description:
Target a hero adjacent to you.
+1 ::attack_gold:: Attack for every card in your discard.

garrus.name: Angry Swipe
garrus.description:
Target a hero adjacent to you.
+1 ::attack_gold:: Attack for every card in your discard.

garrus.name: Chilling Howl
garrus.description:
You may discard one of your resolved cards.
**This round:** Enemy heroes in radius
cannot fast travel, or move more than
2 spaces with a movement action.

garrus.name: Battle Fury
garrus.description:
Each time after one of your resolved cards is
discarded, you may perform its primary action.

garrus.name: Menace
garrus.description:
Move an enemy unit in range 1 space
to a space farther away from you.

garrus.name: Trace
garrus.description:
**Choose one ΓÇö**
>> Before the attack: If you have one or more
cards in the discard, you may move 1 space.
>Target a hero adjacent to you.
>>Target a hero adjacent to you.

garrus.name: Hold Ground
garrus.description:
If there at least two enemy heroes in
radius, you may retrieve a discarded card.

garrus.name: Threaten
garrus.description:
Move an enemy unit in range 1 space
to a space farther away from you.
May repeat once.

garrus.name: Chase
garrus.description:
**Choose one ΓÇö**
>> Before the attack: If you have one or more
cards in the discard, move up to 2 spaces.
>Target a hero adjacent to you.
>>Target a hero adjacent to you.

garrus.name: Make a Stand
garrus.description:
If there are at least two enemy heroes in
radius, you may retrieve a discarded card.

garrus.name: Form Up!
garrus.description:
Move a friendly unit in range 1 space
to a space closer to you.
May repeat once.

garrus.name: Blunt Force
garrus.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: You may move 1 space to a
space adjacent to an enemy hero; if you do,
push that hero 3 spaces, ignoring obstacles.

garrus.name: Light Pilum
garrus.description:
An enemy hero in range discards a card,
if able. You may move 1 space.

garrus.name: Terrify
garrus.description:
Move an enemy unit in range 1 space
to a space farther away from you.
May repeat up to two times.

garrus.name: Hunt Down
garrus.description:
**Choose one ΓÇö**
>> Before the attack: If you have one or more
cards in the discard, move up to 3 spaces.
>Target a hero adjacent to you.
>>Target a hero adjacent to you.

garrus.name: Battle Ready
garrus.description:
If there are at least two enemy heroes
in radius, you may retrieve up to
two discarded cards.

garrus.name: Testudo!
garrus.description:
Move a friendly unit in range 1 space
to a space closer to you.
May repeat up to two times.

garrus.name: Send Flying
garrus.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. After the attack:
you may move up to 2 spaces to a space
adjacent to an enemy hero; if you do, push
that hero 3 spaces, ignoring obstacles.

garrus.name: Heavy Pilum
garrus.description:
An enemy hero in range discards a card,
or is defeated. You may move up to 2 spaces.

hanu.name: Fight and Flight
hanu.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
If the target is not defeated, After the attack:
If able, move 3 spaces in a straight line.

hanu.name: Fight or Flight
hanu.description:
Target a hero adjacent to you.
If the target is not defeated, After the attack:
If able, move 3 spaces in a straight line.

hanu.name: Hurry up!
hanu.description:
Set the printed ::initiative:: Initiative value of an
unresolved card of a hero in range to 11,
until it is resolved, or otherwise changes state.
~(This may change the initiative order and tie breakers.)

hanu.name: The Ultimate Trick
hanu.description:
You choose the next action, and how
it is performed, for a hero you
target with the "Hurry Up!".

hanu.name: Unexpected Journey
hanu.description:
Swap with an enemy hero in radius.
**This turn:** That hero is immune.
**End of turn:** Swap with that hero,
regardless of radius and immunity.

hanu.name: Helping Hand
hanu.description:
**Choose one ΓÇö**
>>Target a unit adjacent to you.
>>Target a hero in range, adjacent to your
>friendly hero.

hanu.name: Monkey Trick
hanu.description: Swap two friendly units in radius.

hanu.name: There and Back Again
hanu.description:
Swap with an enemy hero in radius.
**This turn:** That hero is immune.
**End of turn:** Swap with that hero,
regardless of radius and immunity.

hanu.name: Even the Odds
hanu.description:
**Choose one ΓÇö**
>>Target a unit adjacent to you.
>>Target a hero in range, adjacent to your
>friendly hero.

hanu.name: Monkey Twist
hanu.description: Swap two friendly heroes in radius.

hanu.name: This Way!
hanu.description:
A friendly hero in radius chooses a distance
of 1 or 2; move both of you that number of
spaces in the same direction of your choice.

hanu.name: Outnumber
hanu.description:
**Choose one ΓÇö**
>>Target a unit adjacent to you.
>>Target a minion in range, adjacent to your
>friendly hero.

hanu.name: Hear Nothing
hanu.description: Swap with an enemy hero in radius.

hanu.name: Safe Travels
hanu.description:
Swap with an enemy hero in radius.
**This turn:** That hero is immune.
**End of turn:** Swap with that hero, regardless
of radius and immunity. You may move 1 space.

hanu.name: Trusted Sidekick
hanu.description:
**Choose one, or both,** in any order ΓÇö
>>Target a unit adjacent to you.
>>Target a hero in range, adjacent to your
>friendly hero and not adjacent to you.

hanu.name: Monkey Business
hanu.description:
Swap two friendly units in radius.
You may move 1 space.

hanu.name: That Way!
hanu.description:
A friendly hero in radius chooses a distance
of 1, 2, or 3; move both of you that number of
spaces in the same direction of your choice.

hanu.name: Pile On
hanu.description:
**Choose one, or both,** in any order ΓÇö
>>Target a unit adjacent to you.
>>Target a minion in range, adjacent to your
>friendly.

hanu.name: See Nothing
hanu.description:
Swap with an enemy hero in radius.
You may move 1 space.

ignatia.name: Chaos Bolt
ignatia.description:
::tiebreaker_blue::: Target a non-adjacent minion in range.
---
::tiebreaker_orange:: Target a non-adjacent hero in range.
~(Effect is based on the visible side of the Tie Breaker coin).

ignatia.name: Unreliable Jolt
ignatia.description:
::tiebreaker_blue::: Target a hero adjacent to you.
---
::tiebreaker_orange:: Target a hero in range not adjacent to you.

ignatia.name: Moment of Equilibrium
ignatia.description:
Flip the Tie Breaker coin to a side of your
choice. **This turn and next turn:**
The coin is not flipped after a tie.

ignatia.name: Chaos Incarnate
ignatia.description:
After you perform a primary action, you may
flip the Tie Breaker token to the other side
and repeat that action once, if able.

ignatia.name: Abrupt Combustion
ignatia.description:
::tiebreaker_blue::: An enemy hero in radius, adjacent to a
token, or a minion, discards a card, If able.
---
::tiebreaker_orange:: An adjacent enemy hero
discards a card, if able.

ignatia.name: Playing with Fire
ignatia.description:
::tiebreaker_blue::: Target a hero in a straight line.
---
::tiebreaker_orange:: Target a hero not in a straight line.

ignatia.name: Path of Ashes
ignatia.description:
::tiebreaker_blue::: Move up to 2 spaces in a straight line.
Place a ::token_magma:: magma token in each empty
space you moved through, or out of.
---
::tiebreaker_orange:: Place up to 2 magma tokens in radius
adjacent to another magma token, if able.

ignatia.name: Spontaneous Immolation
ignatia.description:
::tiebreaker_blue::: An enemy hero in radius, adjacent to a
token, or a minion, discards a card, If able.
---
::tiebreaker_orange:: An adjacent enemy hero
discards a card, if able.

ignatia.name: Erratic Fireblast
ignatia.description:
::tiebreaker_blue::: Target a unit in a straight line.
---
::tiebreaker_orange:: Target a unit not in a straight line.

ignatia.name: Path of Cinders
ignatia.description:
::tiebreaker_blue::: Move up to 3 spaces in a straight line.
Place a ::token_magma:: magma token in each empty
space you moved through, or out of.
---
::tiebreaker_orange:: Place up to 3 magma tokens in radius
adjacent to another magma token, if able.

ignatia.name: Searing Heat
ignatia.description:
::tiebreaker_blue::: Move an adjacent enemy
unit up to 3 spaces.
---
::tiebreaker_orange:: Move a non-adjacent enemy
unit in radius up to 1 spaces.

ignatia.name: Crack of Doom
ignatia.description:
::tiebreaker_blue::: Target a unit at a maximum range.
---
::tiebreaker_orange:: Target an adjacent unit.

ignatia.name: Unstable Portal
ignatia.description:
::tiebreaker_blue::: You swap with a friendly unit in radius.
---
::tiebreaker_orange:: You swap with an enemy unit in radius.

ignatia.name: Violent Conflagration
ignatia.description:
::tiebreaker_blue::: An enemy hero in radius,
adjacent to a token, or a minion,
discards a card, or is defeated.
---
::tiebreaker_orange:: An adjacent enemy hero
discards a card, or is defeated.

ignatia.name: Loosely-Aimed Firebolts
ignatia.description:
::tiebreaker_blue::: Target a unit in a straight line.
Repeat once on a different hero.
---
::tiebreaker_orange:: Target a unit not in a straight line.

ignatia.name: Path of Flames
ignatia.description:
::tiebreaker_blue::: Move up to 4 spaces in a straight line.
Place a ::token_magma:: magma token in each empty
space you moved through, or out of.
---
::tiebreaker_orange:: Place up to 4 magma tokens in radius
adjacent to another magma token, if able.

ignatia.name: Scorching Blaze
ignatia.description:
::tiebreaker_blue::: Move an adjacent enemy unit up to 4
spaces. Repeat once on a different target.
---
::tiebreaker_orange:: Move a non-adjacent enemy
unit in radius up to 2 spaces.

ignatia.name: Imminent Eruption
ignatia.description:
::tiebreaker_blue::: Target a unit at a maximum range.
---
::tiebreaker_orange:: Target an adjacent unit.
Repeat once on a minion.

ignatia.name: Chaos Gate
ignatia.description:
::tiebreaker_blue::: You swap with a friendly unit in radius.
---
::tiebreaker_orange:: You swap with an enemy unit in radius.

min.name: Fast as Lightning
min.description:
Target a unit in range. After the attack:
Apply the "After the attack" text of your
resolved or discarded red card.
~(If it has radius, use that card's value.)

min.name: Chop Down
min.description:
Target a hero adjacent to you.
After the attack: Apply the "After the attack"
text of your resolved or discarded red card.

min.name: Smoke Bomb
min.description:
Place a ::token_smoke_bomb:: smoke bomb token in radius;
enemy heroes cannot target another you or another
unit if there is the Smoke Bomb on a straight
line between that enemy hero and their target.

min.name: Flurry of blows
min.description:
Each time after you perform an attack action,
you may repeat it once on a different target.

min.name: Trip Mine
min.description:
Place 2 mine tokens, 1 ::token_blast:: blast and 1 ::token_dud:: dud,
facedown in radius; units may move through
them; remove mine tokens after an enemy
hero moves through them; for every blast
removed, that hero discards a card, if able.

min.name: Crane Stance
min.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: Push an enemy unit
adjacent to you up to 3 spaces.

min.name: Poof!
min.description:
Swap with a ::token_smoke_bomb:: Smoke bomb in range;
if you do, block the attack.

min.name: Cluster Mine
min.description:
Place 3 mine tokens, 1 ::token_blast:: blast and 2 ::token_dud::
duds, facedown in radius; units may move
through them; remove mine tokens after an
enemy hero moves through them; for every
blast removed, that hero discards a card, if able.

min.name: Tiger Stance
min.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: You may move 1 space to a
space adjacent to the target. Push an enemy
unit adjacent to you up to 3 spaces.

min.name: Vanish
min.description:
Swap with a ::token_smoke_bomb:: Smoke bomb in range;
if you do, block the attack.

min.name: Death Grenade
min.description:
Place a ::token_grenade:: Grenade token into a space in
radius. **End of turn:** Up to 1 enemy hero
adjacent to that token discards a card, or is
defeated. Remove the Grenade token.

min.name: Viper Stance
min.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: You may swap
with a ::token_smoke_bomb:: Smoke bomb in radius.

min.name: Minefield
min.description:
Place 3 mine tokens, 2 ::token_blast:: blasts and 1 ::token_dud::
dud, facedown in radius; units may move
through them; remove mien tokens after an
enemy hero moves through them; for every
blast removed, that hero discards a card, if able.

min.name: Dragon Stance
min.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: You may move 1 or 2 spaces
to a space adjacent to the target. Push an
enemy unit adjacent to you up to 3 spaces.

min.name: Ruse
Holy Death Grenade
min.description:
Place a ::token_grenade:: grenade token into a space in
radius. **End of turn:** Up to 2 enemy heroes
adjacent to that token discard a card, or are
defeated. Remove the Grenade token.

min.name: Cobra Stance
min.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: You may swap with
a ::token_smoke_bomb:: Smoke bomb radius; if you do, you may
place the Smoke bomb into a space in radius.

min.name: Perfect Self
min.description:
**Choose one, or both ΓÇö**
>> **This round:** Double your item bonuses.
>> Take a Tier II card from your deck and add
it to your dashboard as a permanent item.

misa.name: Watch How I Soar
misa.description:
**Choose one ΓÇö**
>>Place yourself into a space
>at maximum range.
>>Defeat a minion adjacent to you.

misa.name: Leaf on the Wind
misa.description:
Place yourself into a space
at maximum range.

misa.name: Swoop In
misa.description:
Place yourself into a space in radius adjacent
to two or more enemy units; if you do,
you may retrieve a discarded card.

misa.name: Power Overwhelming
misa.description:
Whenever you choose one, you may choose
two different options instead, in any order.
Each time after you place yourself, an enemy
hero adjacent to you discards a card, if able.

misa.name: Sudden Breeze
misa.description:
Move up to 3 spaces in a straight line, ignoring
obstacles; you may place an enemy unit you
moved through into a space adjacent to you.

misa.name: Challenge Accepted
misa.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. After the attack:
**This turn:** Gain +2 ::defense_silver:: Defense.

misa.name: Focus
misa.description:
**Next turn:** Before you perform a
primary action, you may move 1 space.

misa.name: Gust of Wind
misa.description:
Move up to 4 spaces in a straight line ignoring
obstacles; you may place an enemy unit you
moved through into a space adjacent to you.

misa.name: Matter of Honor
misa.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. After the attack:
**This turn:** Gain +3 ::defense_silver:: Defense.

misa.name: Discipline
misa.description:
**Next turn:** Before you perform a primary
action, move up to 2 spaces.

misa.name: Living Tornado
misa.description: Swap two units at maximum radius.

misa.name: Power Shot
misa.description:
Target a unit in range. After the attack: If the
target was at maximum range, you may move
it 1 space, to a space farther away from you.

misa.name: Dash and Slash
misa.description:
Move up to 4 spaces in a straight line,
ignoring obstacles. An enemy hero you
moved through discards a card, if able.

misa.name: Crushing Squall
misa.description:
Move up to 5 spaces in a straight line, ignoring
obstacles; you may place an enemy unit you
moved through into a space adjacent to you.

misa.name: Worthy Opponent
misa.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack:
**This turn:** Gain +5 ::defense_silver:: Defense.

misa.name: Mastery
misa.description:
**Next turn:** Before you perform a
primary action, you may move 3 spaces.

misa.name: Storm Spirit
misa.description:
Swap two units in radius and
at equal distance from you.

misa.name: Thunder Shot
misa.description:
Target a unit in range. After the attack:
If the target is not adjacent to you, you may move it
1 space, to a space farther away from you.

misa.name: Death from Above
misa.description:
Move up to 5 spaces in a straight line,
ignoring obstacles; an enemy hero you
moved through discards a card, if able.

nebkher.name: Mind Grip
nebkher.description:
**Choose one ΓÇö**
>>Perform the primary action of the card in
>the previous turn slot of an enemy hero in
>range; apply no item bonuses. If you would
>place a token, place an illusion token
>instead. Ignore effects that give markers.
>>Defeat a minion adjacent to you.

nebkher.name: Mind Probe
nebkher.description:
Perform the action on the card in the previous
turn slot of an enemy hero in range; if you
would place any tokens this way, place a ::token_illusion::
Illusion tokens instead; do not use markers.

nebkher.name: Diabolical Laughter
nebkher.description:
Laugh diabolically. If you do, **choose one ΓÇö**
>>You swap with an illusion token in radius.
>>You swap with a friendly minion in radius.
>>You are defeated. Enemies gain no coins.
>>**Next turn:** Gain +2 ::initiative:: Initiative.

nebkher.name: What the Hell Are You?
nebkher.description:
If you would be defeated as part of your own
action, first defeat all enemy minions in radius
and enemy heroes in radius discard a card, or
are defeated. Spend no life counters.

nebkher.name: Imbue Doubt
nebkher.description:
A hero in radius must swap their unresolved
card with another card in their hand, if able.

nebkher.name: Assume Control
nebkher.description:
**Choose one ΓÇö**
>>Before the attack: Move a friendly minion in
>range up to 3 spaces to a space adjacent to
>an enemy hero in range. Target that hero.
>>Target a minion adjacent to you.

nebkher.name: Fleeting Image
nebkher.description:
Place an ::token_illusion:: illusion token in radius.
**This round:** After an action makes you
discard a card, swap with an illusion token,
regardless of radius, then remove that token.
~(Complete the action causing the discard before the swap).

nebkher.name: Time to Reconsider
nebkher.description:
A hero in radius must swap their unresolved
card with another card in their hand, if able.

nebkher.name: Direct Control
nebkher.description:
**Choose one ΓÇö**
>>Before the attack: Move a friendly minion in
>range up to 4 spaces to a space adjacent to
>an enemy hero in range. Target that hero.
>>Target a minion adjacent to you.

nebkher.name: Multiple Projections
nebkher.description:
Place up to 2 ::token_illusion:: illusion tokens in radius.
**This round:** After an action makes you
discard a card, swap with an illusion token,
regardless of radius, then remove that token.

nebkher.name: Crack in Reality
nebkher.description:
Split the board with a straight line of spaces
drawn through your space: **This turn:**
Units on either side of the line are immune to
actions of units on the opposite side of the line.

nebkher.name: Twist Fate
nebkher.description:
Target a unit in range. After the attack:
If you target a hero, you may swap any
two of their resolved cards.
~(Any active effects on the swapped cards are canceled).

nebkher.name: Phantasmal Warrior
nebkher.description:
Place an ::token_illusion:: illusion token in radius. **This**
**round:** While you are performing actions, the
illusion tokens count as friendly melee minions.

nebkher.name: An Illusion of Choice
nebkher.description:
A hero in radius must swap their unresolved
card with another card in their hand, if able.
May repeat once on the same Hero.

nebkher.name: Master of Puppets
nebkher.description:
**Choose one, or both**, in any order **ΓÇö**
>>Before the attack: Move a friendly minion in
>range up to 4 spaces to a space adjacent to
>an enemy hero in range. Target that hero.
>>Target a minion adjacent to you.

nebkher.name: Master Of Illusions
nebkher.description:
Place up to 3 ::token_illusion:: illusion tokens in radius.
**This round:** After an action makes you
discard a card, swap with an illusion token,
regardless of radius, then remove that token.

nebkher.name: Shift Reality
nebkher.description:
Split the board with a straight line of spaces
drawn through your space: **This turn:** You are
immune to actions of units on either side of
the line. All other units are immune to actions
of units on the opposite side of the line.

nebkher.name: Devious Scheme
nebkher.description:
Target a unit in range. After the attack:
If you target a hero, you may swap
any two of their resolved, unresolved,
or discarded cards.

nebkher.name: Phantasmal Colossus
nebkher.description:
Place an ::token_illusion:: illusion token in radius. **This**
**round:** Illusion tokens are immune to enemy
actions. While you are performing actions, the
illusion tokens count as friendly melee minions.

sabina.name: Point Blank Shot
sabina.description:
Target a unit in range. After the attack:
If the target is adjacent to you, push the target 1 space.

sabina.name: Bang
sabina.description:
Target a hero adjacent to you.
After the attack: Push the target 1 space.

sabina.name: Back to Back
sabina.description: Swap with a friendly minion in radius.

sabina.name: Big Sodding Gun
sabina.description:
Your basic attack has +2 ::range_gold:: Range and
+2 ::attack_gold:: Attack. If you push an enemy hero,
that hero discards a card, or is defeated.

sabina.name: Quickdraw
sabina.description:
Target a unit in range. +3 ::attack_red:: Attack if the
target played an attack card this turn.

sabina.name: Troop Movement
sabina.description:
Move a friendly minion in radius up to 1 space,
to a space in radius. May repeat once.

sabina.name: Gunslinger
sabina.description:
Target a unit in range. +3 ::attack_red:: Attack if the
target played an attack card this turn.

sabina.name: Marching Orders
sabina.description:
Move a friendly minion in radius 1 space,
to a space in radius. May repeat once.

sabina.name: Steady Advance
Shootout
sabina.description:
Target a unit in range. After the attack:
If the target was adjacent to you, remove
up to one enemy minion adjacent to you.
~(You gain no coins for removing a minion, only defeating.)

sabina.name: Close Support
sabina.description:
An enemy hero in radius adjacent to your
friendly minion discards a card, if able.

sabina.name: Ready and Waiting
sabina.description:
Swap two minions in radius,
ignoring heavy minion immunity.

sabina.name: Dead Shot
sabina.description:
Target a unit in range. +4 ::attack_red:: Attack if the
target played an attack card this turn.

sabina.name: Path to Victory
sabina.description:
Move a friendly minion in radius 1 space, to a
space in radius. May repeat up to two times.

sabina.name: Unwavering Resolve
Bullet Hell
sabina.description:
Target a unit in range. After the attack:
If the target was adjacent to you, remove
up to two enemy minions adjacent to you.

sabina.name: Covering Fire
sabina.description:
An enemy hero in radius adjacent to your
friendly minion discards a card, or is defeated.

silverarrow.name: Shoot and Scoot
silverarrow.description:
Target a unit at maximum range.
After the attack: If able, you may
fast travel to an adjacent zone.

silverarrow.name: Keep the Distance
silverarrow.description:
Target a hero at maximum range.
After the attack: If able, you may
fast travel up to an adjacent zone.

silverarrow.name: Trailblazer
silverarrow.description:
You may fast travel, if able.
**This round:** You and friendly heroes
in radius may ignore obstacles while
performing movement actions.

silverarrow.name: Wild Hunt
silverarrow.description:
Each time before you perform an action,
you may move 2 spaces in a straight line.

silverarrow.name: Grasping Roots
silverarrow.description:
**This turn:** Enemy heroes in radius cannot
fast travel, or move more than 1 space
with a movement action.

silverarrow.name: Snap Shot
silverarrow.description:
**Choose one ΓÇö**
>>Target a unit in range, which is not
adjacent to any other unit.
>>Target a hero adjacent to you.

silverarrow.name: Disorient
silverarrow.description:
Move an enemy unit adjacent to you 1 space;
if you do, you may move 1 space.

silverarrow.name: Entangling Vines
silverarrow.description:
**This turn:** Enemy heroes in radius cannot
fast travel, or move more than 1 space
with a movement action.

silverarrow.name: Opportunity Shot
silverarrow.description:
**Choose one ΓÇö**
>>Target a unit in range, which is not
>>adjacent to any other unit.
>>Target a hero adjacent to you.

silverarrow.name: Divert Attention
silverarrow.description:
Move an enemy unit adjacent to you up
to 2 spaces; if you do, move up to that
number of spaces in a straight line.

silverarrow.name: Warning Shot
silverarrow.description:
**End of turn:** An enemy hero in radius
discards a card, if able.

silverarrow.name: Long Shot
silverarrow.description: Target a unit at maximum range.

silverarrow.name: Fae Healing
silverarrow.description:
A hero  in radius may retrieve a discarded
card; if they do, that hero gains 1 coin.

silverarrow.name: Grappling Branches
silverarrow.description:
**This turn:** Enemy heroes in radius cannot
fast travel, or move more than 1 space
with a movement action.

silverarrow.name: Clear Shot
silverarrow.description:
**Choose one ΓÇö**
>>Target a unit in range, which is not
>adjacent to any other unit.
>>Target a hero adjacent to you.

silverarrow.name: Lead Astray
silverarrow.description:
Move an enemy unit adjacent to you up
to 3 spaces; if you do, move up to that
number of spaces in a straight line.

silverarrow.name: Treetop Sentinel
silverarrow.description:
**End of turn:** An enemy hero in radius
discards a card, or is defeated.

silverarrow.name: Rain of Arrows
silverarrow.description:
Target a unit at maximum range.
If you target a hero, repeat once on a different
hero; if you do, may repeat once on a minion.

silverarrow.name: Nature's Blessing
silverarrow.description:
A hero in radius may retrieve a discarded
card; if they do, that hero gains 2 coins.

swift.name: Reload!
swift.description:
**Choose one ΓÇö**
>>Perform the primary action of your
>rightmost resolved card.
>>Defeat a minion adjacent to you.

swift.name: Backup
swift.description:
Perform the primary action of your rightmost
resolved card. If you perform an Attack
action this way, you cannot target minions.

swift.name: Bounce
swift.description:
Move 2 spaces in a straight line, ignoring
obstacles; if this card is already resolved as
you perform this action, may repeat once.

swift.name: Bullet Time
swift.description:
After you resolve a basic card, you may
perform the primary action on that card;
you cannot target the same enemy hero
twice in the same turn this way.

swift.name: Steam Jump
swift.description:
Place yourself into a space in a straight
line in radius. Push an enemy unit
adjacent to you up to 1 space.

swift.name: Snipe
swift.description:
Target a unit at maximum range,
and in in a straight line.

swift.name: Suppress
swift.description:
An enemy hero in radius who is not
adjacent to terrain discards a card, if able.

swift.name: Assault Jump
swift.description:
Place yourself into a space in a straight
line in radius. Push an enemy unit
adjacent to you up to 2 spaces.

swift.name: Prepared Shot
swift.description:
Target a unit in range, in a straight
line, and not adjacent to you.

swift.name: Pin Down
swift.description:
An enemy hero in radius who is not
adjacent to terrain discards a card, if able.

swift.name: Delayed Jump
swift.description:
**End of turn:** Place yourself into a space
in radius not in a straight line from you.

swift.name: Shotgun
swift.description:
Target a unit in range. Before the attack:
An enemy hero adjacent to the target
discards a card, if able.

swift.name: Mark for Death
swift.description:
Move an enemy minion in radius up
to 3 spaces to a space in radius.
**Next turn:** The first time an enemy minion
in radius is defeated, gain 1 coin.

swift.name: Drop Trooper
swift.description:
Place yourself into a space in a straight line
in radius. Push up to two enemy units
adjacent to you up to 2 spaces.

swift.name: Killshot
swift.description:
Target a unit in range, in a straight
line, and not adjacent to you.

swift.name: Killing Ground
swift.description:
An enemy hero in radius who is not adjacent
to terrain discards a card, or is defeated.

swift.name: Mobile Scout
swift.description:
**End of turn:** Place yourself into a space in
radius not in a straight line from you.
You may then fast travel, if able.

swift.name: Super-Shotgun
swift.description:
Target a unit in range. Before the attack:
An enemy hero adjacent to the target
discards a card, or is defeated.

swift.name: Hunting Season
swift.description:
Move up to two enemy minions in radius,
up to 3 spaces each, to spaces in radius.
**Next turn:** The first two times an enemy
minion in radius is defeated, gain 1 coin.

heroes.getTali.name: Turn to Ice
heroes.getTali.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. If the target
discards a card to defend, After the attack:
Another enemy hero in radius discards a
card of the same color, if able.

heroes.getTali.name: Ice Shard
heroes.getTali.description:
Target a hero adjacent to you. If the target
discards a card to defend, After the attack:
Another enemy hero in radius discards a
card of the same color, if able.

heroes.getTali.name: Commune with Spirits
heroes.getTali.description:
A friendly hero in play names a color;
you may discard a card of that color.
Perform the primary aciton on a card
of that color in your discard.

heroes.getTali.name: Reign of Winter
heroes.getTali.description:
Each time after you defeat a minion with your
basic attack, an enemy hero in radius discards
a card of the color of your choice, if able.

heroes.getTali.name: Cold Snap
heroes.getTali.description:
Choose a direction. Move each enemy unit
in radius 1 space in that direction, if able.

heroes.getTali.name: Winter Dagger
heroes.getTali.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
+3 ::attack_red:: Attack if this card is not in the discard.

heroes.getTali.name: Glacial Barrier
heroes.getTali.description:
Place an ::token_ice:: ice token in radius.
Enemy heroes have -1 ::initiative:: Initiative for
every Ice token they are adjacent to.

heroes.getTali.name: Snowstorm
heroes.getTali.description:
Choose a direction. Move each enemy unit in
radius 1 space in that direciton, if able.

heroes.getTali.name: Winter Spear
heroes.getTali.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
+3 ::attack_red:: Attack if this card is not in the discard.

heroes.getTali.name: Wall of Frost
heroes.getTali.description:
Place up to 2 ::token_ice:: ice tokens in radius.
Enemy heroes have -1 ::initiative:: Initiative
for every Ice token they are adjacent to.

heroes.getTali.name: Guardian Spirit
heroes.getTali.description:
Up to 1 friendly hero in radius
may retrieve a discarded card.
If "Guardian Spirit" is in the discard, retrieve it.

heroes.getTali.name: Spirit Wolf
heroes.getTali.description:
**Choose one ΓÇö**
>>If this card is not in the discard,
>target a unit in range.
>>Target a hero adjacent to you.

heroes.getTali.name: Ancestral Totem
heroes.getTali.description:
Place a ::token_totem:: in range.
If a friendly melee minion adjacent to a Totem
would be defeated, remove the totem instead.

heroes.getTali.name: Blizzard
heroes.getTali.description:
Choose a direction. Move each enemy unit
in radius 1 space in that direction, if able.
If this card is in the discard, **End of turn:**
May repeat once.

heroes.getTali.name: Winter Scepter
heroes.getTali.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
+3 ::attack_red:: Attack if this card is not in the discard.

heroes.getTali.name: Pack Ice
heroes.getTali.description:
Place up to 3 ::token_ice:: ice tokens in radius.
Enemy heroes have -1 ::initiative:: Initiative for
every Ice token they are adjacent to.

heroes.getTali.name: Warrior Spirit
heroes.getTali.description:
Up to 1 friendly hero in radius may retrieve
a discarded card. If "Warrior Spirit" is in the
discard, you may retrieve a discarded card.

heroes.getTali.name: Spirit Bear
heroes.getTali.description:
**Choose one, or both,** on different targets ΓÇö
>>If this card is not in the discard,
>target a unit in range.
>>Target a hero adjacent to you.

heroes.getTali.name: Venerated Totem
heroes.getTali.description:
Place a ::token_totem:: in range.
If a friendly minion adjacent to a totem would
be defeated, remove the totem instead.
Totem tokens are immune to enemy actions.

tigerclaw.name: Blink Strike
tigerclaw.description:
Before the attack: Move 2 spaces in a straight
line through an enemy unit; target that unit.
~(If you cannot make this move, you cannot attack).

tigerclaw.name: Nimble Strike
tigerclaw.description:
Before the attack: Move 2 spaces in a straight
line through an enemy hero; target that hero.

tigerclaw.name: Blend Into Shadows
tigerclaw.description:
If adjacent to terrain, place yourself
into a space in radius; if you do, **Next turn:**
You are immune to enemy attack actions.

tigerclaw.name: Cloak and Daggers
tigerclaw.description:
After you perform a basic action, you may
repeat it once; if you repeat an attack
action, you cannot target the same unit.

tigerclaw.name: Hit and Run
tigerclaw.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: You may move 1 space.

tigerclaw.name: Light-Fingered
tigerclaw.description:
You may move 1 space.
Take 1 coin from an enemy hero adjacent
to you; if you do, you may move 1 space.

tigerclaw.name: Sidestep
tigerclaw.description:
Block a ranged attack.
You may move 1 space.

tigerclaw.name: Combat Reflexes
tigerclaw.description:
Before the attack: You may move 1 space.
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: If you did not move before
the attack, you may move 1 space.

tigerclaw.name: Pick Pocket
tigerclaw.description:
Move up to 2 spaces.
Take 1 coin from an enemy hero adjacent to
you; if you do, you may move 1 space.

tigerclaw.name: Parry
tigerclaw.description:
Block a non-ranged attack.
The attacker discards a card, if able.

tigerclaw.name: Backstab
tigerclaw.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you; if a friendly
unit is adjacent to the target, +2 ::attack_red:: Attack.
~(A "friendly unit" is another hero or a minion on your team.)

tigerclaw.name: Poisoned Dagger
tigerclaw.description:
Give a hero in range a ::marker_poison:: poison marker.
The hero with a poison marker has
-1 ::initiative:: Initiative, -1 ::attack_silver:: Attack, and -1 ::defense_silver:: Defense.

tigerclaw.name: Evade
tigerclaw.description:
Block a ranged attack.
You may move 1 space. You may retrieve
your resolved or discarded basic skill card.

tigerclaw.name: Leaping Strike
tigerclaw.description:
Before the attack: You may move 1 space.
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: You may move 1 space.

tigerclaw.name: Master Thief
Riposte
tigerclaw.description:
Block a non-ranged attack. The attacker
discards a card, or is defeated.

tigerclaw.name: Backstab with a Ballista
tigerclaw.description:
Target a unit in range;
if a friendly unit is adjacent to the target
+2 ::attack_red:: Attack, and the target cannot
perform a primary action to defend.

tigerclaw.name: Poisoned Dart
tigerclaw.description:
Give a hero in range a ::marker_poison:: poison marker.
The hero with a poison marker has
-2 ::initiative:: Initiative, -2 ::attack_silver:: Attack, and -2 ::defense_silver:: Defense.

trinkets.name: Rapid Deployment
trinkets.description:
**Choose one ΓÇö**
>>You may remove the turret. Move up to
>3 spaces and place the Turret into an
>adjacent space. It counts as terrain.
>>An enemy hero in range of both you and
>the Turret discards a card, if able.
>>Defeat an enemy minion in range of both
>you and the Turret.

trinkets.name: Ramshackle Turret
trinkets.description:
Move up to 3 spaces and place
the Turret into a space adjacent to you;
it counts as an obstacle.
~(The Turret is not a token and remains in play between rounds.)

trinkets.name: Salvage Parts
trinkets.description:
**Choose one ΓÇö**
>>Place the Turret into an adjacent space.
>It counts as terrain.
>>Remove the Turret. If you do, move
>up to 3 spaces.

trinkets.name: Fortified Positions
trinkets.description:
Whenever you perform an action, barrier
tokens and friendly minions count as a Turret.

trinkets.name: Disruptor Jolt
trinkets.description:
**This turn:** Enemy heroes in radius of the
Turret cannot perform non-basic skills.

trinkets.name: Makeshift Minigun
trinkets.description:
Target a unit in range of both you and the
Turret. After the attack: **Next turn:**
Gain +1 ::range_red:: Range if you target a hero.

trinkets.name: Early Prototype
trinkets.description:
Swap yourself, a friendly unit, or a token,
in radius of the Turret, with the Turret.

trinkets.name: Disruptor Pulse
trinkets.description:
Cancel skills with active effects of enemies in
radius of the Turret. **This turn:** Enemy heroes
in radius of the Turret cannot perform skills.

trinkets.name: Gatling Gun
trinkets.description:
Target a unit in range of both you and the
Turret. After the attack: **Next turn:**
Gain +1 ::range_red:: Range; if you target a hero
with no cards in their hand with your
basic skill, defeat that hero, instead.

trinkets.name: Teleportation Device
trinkets.description:
Swap yourself, a friendly unit, or a token,
in radius of the Turret, with the Turret.

trinkets.name: Deployable Barrier
trinkets.description:
Place up to 2 ::token_barrier:: barrier tokens in radius of
the Turret and adjacent to another barrier
token, if able. You and friendly heroes gain
+1 ::defense_silver:: Defense for each adjacent barrier token.

trinkets.name: Steam Discharge
trinkets.description:
Target a unit in range of both you and the
Turret. After the attack: One other enemy
hero in range of you and adjacent to the
Turret discards a card, if able.

trinkets.name: Self-Destruct
trinkets.description:
Enemy heroes in radius of the Turret discard
a card, if able. Remove the Turret.

trinkets.name: Disruptor Grid
trinkets.description:
Cancel skills with active effects of
enemies in radius of the Turret.
**This turn and next turn:** Enemies in
radius of the Turret cannot perform skills.

trinkets.name: Repeater Cannon
trinkets.description:
Target a unit in range of both you and the
Turret. After the attack: **Next turn:**
Gain +2 ::range_red:: Range; if you target a hero
with no cards in their hand with your
basic skill, defeat that hero, instead.

trinkets.name: Perfected Design
trinkets.description:
Swap yourself, any unit, or a token,
in radius of the Turret, with the Turret.

trinkets.name: Deployable Bastion
trinkets.description:
Place up to 3 ::token_barrier:: barrier tokens in radius of
the Turret and adjacent to another barrier
token, if able. You and friendly heroes gain
+1 ::defense_silver:: Defense for each adjacent barrier token.

trinkets.name: Flame Belcher
trinkets.description:
Target a unit in range of both you and the
Turret. After the attack: One other enemy
hero in range of both you and the Turret
discards a card, if able.

trinkets.name: Emergency Protocol
trinkets.description:
Enemy heroes in radius of the Turret discard
a card, or are defeated. Remove the Turret.

ursafar.name: Claws That Catch
ursafar.description:
Before the attack: If enraged, you may
move 1 space to a space adjacent to an
enemy hero. Target a unit adjacent to you.
**This round:** You are enraged.

ursafar.name: Jaws That Bite
ursafar.description:
Before the attack: If enraged, you may
move 1 space to a space adjacent to an
enemy hero. Target a hero adjacent to you.
**This round:** You are enraged.

ursafar.name: Angry Roar
ursafar.description:
If enraged, perform the primary action on one
of your active cards with an active effect.
**This round:** You are enraged.

ursafar.name: Unbound Fury
ursafar.description:
You are always enraged, and all your
resolved cards count as active.

ursafar.name: Prowling Brute
ursafar.description:
If enraged, after movement, you may swap
with a unit or token adjacent to you.
**This round:** You are enraged.

ursafar.name: Prey Drive
ursafar.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. After the attack:
If enraged, and the target weas not removed,
remove up to 1 enemy minion in radius.
**This round:** You are enraged.

ursafar.name: Sniff Out
ursafar.description:
If enraged, an enemy hero in range
discards a card, if able.

ursafar.name: Rampaging Beast
ursafar.description:
If enraged, after movement, you may swap
with a unit or token adjacent to you;
if you do, move up to 1 additional space.
**This round:** You are enraged.

ursafar.name: Prey Abundance
ursafar.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. After the attack:
If enraged, and the target was not removed,
remove up to 1 enemy minion in radius.
**This round:** You are enraged.

ursafar.name: Eyes on the Prey
ursafar.description:
If enraged, an enemy hero in range
discards a card, if able.

ursafar.name: Cold Ire
ursafar.description:
If enraged, gain +1 ::movement_blue:: Movement.
**This round:** You are enraged.

ursafar.name: Rip
ursafar.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: If enraged, gain 1 coin.
**This round:** you are enraged.

ursafar.name: Instinctive Reaction
ursafar.description:
If enraged, **choose one ΓÇö**
>>Perform the primary action on one
>of your discarded cards.
>>You may retrieve a discarded card.

ursafar.name: Unstoppable Force
ursafar.description:
If enraged, after movement, you may swap
with a unit or token adjacent to you;
if you do, move up to 2 additional spaces.
**This round:** You are enraged.

ursafar.name: Feeding Frenzy
ursafar.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. After the attack:
If enraged, and the target was not removed,
remove up to 2 enemy minions in radius.
**This round:** You are enraged.

ursafar.name: Apex Predator
ursafar.description:
If enraged, an enemy hero in range
discards a card, or is defeated.

ursafar.name: Eyes of Flame
ursafar.description:
If enraged, gain +2 ::movement_blue:: Movement.
**This round:** You are enraged.

ursafar.name: Tear
ursafar.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: If enraged, gain 2 coins.;
if you defeated a hero, that hero spends
1 additional ::life_counters:: Life counter.
**This round:** you are enraged.

ursafar.name: Evolutionary Response
ursafar.description:
If enraged, **choose one, or both ΓÇö**
>> Perform the primary action on one
>of your discarded cards.
>> You may retrieve a discarded card.

wasp.name: Magnetic Dagger
wasp.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: **This turn:** Enemy units
in radius cannot be swapped or placed
by themselves or by enemy heroes.

wasp.name: Crackling Dagger
wasp.description:
Target a hero adjacent to you.
After the attack: **This turn:** Enemy units
in radius cannot be swapped or placed
by themselves or by enemy heroes.

wasp.name: Static Barrier
wasp.description:
**This turn:** While an enemy hero outside of
radius is performing an action, spaces in
radius count as obstacles. While an enemy
hero in radius is performing an action,
spaces outside of radius count as obstacles.

wasp.name: High Voltage
wasp.description:
Each time after you perform a basic skill,
you may defeat an enemy minion in radius;
an enemy hero who was adjacent to that
minion discards a card, if able.

wasp.name: Lift Up
wasp.description:
Move a unit, or a token, in radius 1 space,
without moving it away from you or closer to
you. May repeat once on the same target.

wasp.name: Shock
wasp.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: An enemy hero in radius and
not adjacent to you discards a card, if able.

wasp.name: Control Gravity
wasp.description:
Move a unit, or a token, in radius 1 space,
without moving it away from you, or closer to 
you. May repeat once on the same target.

wasp.name: Electrocute
wasp.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: An enemy hero in radius and
not adjacent to you discards a card, if able.

wasp.name: Deflect Projectiles
wasp.description:
Block a ranged attack; if you do, an enemy
hero in range, other than the attacker,
discards a card, if able.

wasp.name: Kinetic Repulse
wasp.description:
Push up to 2 enemy units adjacent to you
3 spaces; if a pushed hero is stopped by an
obstacle, that hero discards a card, if able.

wasp.name: Charged Boomerang
wasp.description:
Target a unit in range and not in a straight line.
~(Units adjacent to you are in a straight line from you.)

wasp.name: Telekinesis
wasp.description:
Place a unit or a token in range, which is not
in a straight line, into a space adjacent to you.

wasp.name: Center of Mass
wasp.description:
Move a unit, or a token, in radius 1 space,
without moving it away from you, or closer
to you. May repeat up to two times
on the same target.

wasp.name: Electroblast
wasp.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. After the attack:
An enemy hero in radius and not adjacent
to you discards a card, or is defeated.

wasp.name: Reflect Projectiles
wasp.description:
Block a ranged attack; if you do, an enemy
hero in range discards a card, if able.

wasp.name: Kinetic Blast
wasp.description:
Push up to 2 enemy units adjacent to you
3 or 4 spaces; if a pushed hero is stopped by
an obstacle, that hero discards a card, if able.

wasp.name: Thunder Boomerang
wasp.description:
Target a unit in range and not in a straight line.
After the attack: If you targeted a hero,
may repeat once on a different target.

wasp.name: Mass Telekinesis
wasp.description:
Place a unit or a token in range, which
is not in a straight line, into a space
adjacent to you. May repeat once.

whisper.name: Swift Justice
whisper.description:
**Choose one ΓÇö**
>>Target a hero in range with an empty discard.
>After the attack: If able, that hero performs a
>movement action on the card they defended
>with, moving full distance in a straight line.
>>Target a unit adjacent to you.

whisper.name: Vile Accusation
whisper.description:
**Choose one ΓÇö**
>>Target a hero in range with an empty discard.
>After the attack: If able, that hero performs a
>movement action on the card they defended
>with, moving full distance in a straight line.
>>Target a hero adjacent to you.

whisper.name: Death Seeker
whisper.description:
If an enemy hero in radius has a card
in the discard, **choose one ΓÇö**
>>**This turn:** You are immune to enemy actions.
>>You may retrieve a discarded card.

whisper.name: Grim Reaper
whisper.description:
When performing basic actions,
you may choose one, or both.

whisper.name: Seeds of Fear
whisper.description:
Target an enemy unit in radius occupying
a spawn point. Move that unit 1 space.

whisper.name: Crimson Trail
whisper.description:
Before the attack: You may move up
to 1 space if there is an empty minion spawn
point in radius in the battle zone.
Target a unit adjacent to you.

whisper.name: Shadow Step
whisper.description:
Place yourself into an empty minion
spawn point in range in the battle zone.

whisper.name: Sprouts of Panic
whisper.description:
Target an enemy unit in radius occupying a
spawn point. Move that unit up to 2 spaces.

whisper.name: Sanguine Path
whisper.description:
Before the attack: Move up to
1 space for every empty minion spawn point
in radius in the battle zone, up to a maximum
of 2 spaces. Target a unit adjacent to you.

whisper.name: Shadow Walk
whisper.description:
Place yourself into an empty minion
spawn point in range in the battle zone.

whisper.name: Lesser Evil
whisper.description:
An enemy hero in range **chooses one ΓÇö**
>>That hero discards a card, if able.
>>You may defeat a minion adjacent to you.
~(Any option can be chosen, even if it would have no effect.)

whisper.name: Blood Fury
whisper.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. After the attack:
If an enemy hero in radius has a card in the
discard, may repeat once on a different target.

whisper.name: Cruel Twist
whisper.description:
Swap with a unit adjacent to you, or with
an enemy hero in range with a card in
the discard. Move up to 2 spaces.

whisper.name: Blooming Nightmare
whisper.description:
Target an enemy unit in radius occupying
a spawn point. Move that unit up to 3 spaces.

whisper.name: Blood Pilgrimage
whisper.description:
Before the attack: You may move up to
1 space for every empty minion spawn point
in radius in the battle zone, up to a maximum
of 3 spaces. Target a unit adjacent to you.

whisper.name: Creeping Shadow
whisper.description:
Place yourself into an empty minion spawn
point in range in the battle zone, or into a
space in range adjacent to such a spawn point.

whisper.name: Greater Good
whisper.description:
An enemy hero in range **chooses one ΓÇö**
>>That hero discards a card, or is defeated.
>>You may defeat up to 3 minions adjacent to you.

whisper.name: Blood Frenzy
whisper.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: If an enemy hero
in radius has a card in the discard,
repeat up to five times on different targets.

whisper.name: Sealed Fate
whisper.description:
Swap with a unit adjacent to you, or with
an enemy hero in range with a card in
the discard. Move up to 3 spaces.

wuk.name: Tree Slam
wuk.description:
If you are adjacent to a tree token, target
a unit in range, otherwise, target a minion
adjacent to you. After the attack:
If the target was adjacent to you, move it
1 space to a space adjacent to you, if able.

wuk.name: Makeshift Weapon
wuk.description:
**Choose one ΓÇö**
>>Target a hero adjacent to you.
>>Remove a ::token_tree:: Tree token adjacent to you.
>Target a hero in range.

wuk.name: Mystic Saplings
wuk.description:
Place up to 3 ::token_tree:: tree tokens in radius, not
adjacent to a tree token. Heroes may move
through a space with a tree token. Do not
remove the tree tokens at the end of round.

wuk.name: March of Nature
wuk.description:
Adjacent Tree tokens in a battle zone count as
melee minions immune to ranged attacks.

wuk.name: Gifts of Nature
wuk.description:
If you are adjacent to a tree, you
may retrieve a discarded card.

wuk.name: Nature's Protector
wuk.description: Target a unit in range, adjacent to a tree token.

wuk.name: Toss Away
wuk.description:
Move up to 1 space. Push an adjacent token
up to 3 spaces. If the token is pushed 2 or
more spaces, an enemy hero adjacent to
that token discards a card, if able.

wuk.name: Tree of Plenty
wuk.description:
Either you, or a hero in radius, may
retrieve a discarded card if either
of you are adjacent to a tree.

wuk.name: Nature's Guardian
wuk.description: Target a unit in range, adjacent to a tree token.

wuk.name: Mighty Throw
wuk.description:
Move up to 1 space. Push an adjacent token
or a minion up to 4 spaces. If it is pushed 2 or
more spaces, an enemy hero adjacent to that
token or a minion discards a card, if able.

wuk.name: Claim Dominance
wuk.description:
**This round:** Up to 1 adjacent non-immune
enemy minion does not count towards the
minion total during minion battle.

wuk.name: Trample
wuk.description:
If you move in a straight line: You may ignore
units; if you moved through an enemy hero,
that hero discards a card, or is defeated;
defeat up to 1 minion you moved through.

wuk.name: Into the Canopy
wuk.description:
Swap places with a tree token in radius.
You may then place a minion adjacent to
that tree token into a space adjacent to you.

wuk.name: Abundance
wuk.description:
Both you and a friendly hero in radius
may retrieve a discarded card if either
of you are adjacent to a tree.

wuk.name: Nature's Champion
wuk.description:
Target a unit in range, adjacent to a tree token.
May repeat once, targeting a different hero.

wuk.name: Monstrous Throw
wuk.description:
Move up to 1 space. Push an adjacent unit
or a token up to 5 spaces. If it is pushed 2
or more spaces, an enemy hero adjacent to
that unit or token discards a card, if able.

wuk.name: Assert Dominance
wuk.description:
**This round:** Up to 2 adjacent enemy minion
do not count towards the minion total during
minion battle, regardless of immunity.

wuk.name: Angry Stampede
wuk.description:
If you move in a straight line: You may ignore
units; if you moved through an enemy hero,
that hero discards a card, or is defeated;
defeat up to 2 minion you moved through.

wuk.name: Treetop Ride
wuk.description:
Swap places with a tree token in radius.
You may then place a minion adjacent to that
tree token into a space adjacent to you.

xargatha.name: Cleave
xargatha.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: May repeat once
on a different enemy hero.

xargatha.name: Desperate Cleave
xargatha.description:
Target a hero adjacent to you.
After the attack: May repeat once
on a different enemy hero.

xargatha.name: Siren's Call
xargatha.description:
Target an enemy unit not adjacent to you
and in range; if able, move that unit
up to 3 spaces to a space adjacent to you.

xargatha.name: Metamorphosis
xargatha.description:
Gain +1 ::movement_silver:: Movement and +1 ::initiative:: Initiative
for each enemy unit adjacent to you.
You may move through obstacles.

xargatha.name: Stone Gaze
xargatha.description:
**Next turn:** Enemy heroes in radius count
as both heroes and terrain, and cannot
perform movement actions.
~(If you move, the radius "moves" with you)

xargatha.name: Threatening Slash
xargatha.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. +1 ::attack_red:: Attack
for each other enemy unit adjacent to you.
~(Do not count the target when calculating the attack bonus.)

xargatha.name: Charm
xargatha.description:
Before or after movement, you may
move an enemy ranged minion
in radius up to 2 spaces.

xargatha.name: Petrifying Stare
xargatha.description:
**Next turn:** Enemy heroes in radius count
as both heroes and terrain, and cannot
perform movement actions.

xargatha.name: Deadly Swipe
xargatha.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. +2 ::attack_red:: Attack
for each other enemy unit adjacent to you.

xargatha.name: Control
xargatha.description:
Before or after movement, you may move
an enemy ranged or melee minion
in radius up to 2 spaces.

xargatha.name: Fresh Converts
xargatha.description:
If you are adjacent to an enemy minion,
you may retrieve a discarded card.

xargatha.name: Long Thrust
xargatha.description:
Target a unit in range. +1 ::range_red:: Range
for each enemy unit adjacent to you.

xargatha.name: Constrict
xargatha.description:
**End of round:** Defeat an enemy
melee minion adjacent to you.
~(Before the end of round minion battle.)

xargatha.name: Turn into Statues
xargatha.description:
**Next turn:** Enemy heroes in radius count
as both heroes and terrain, and cannot
perform movement actions.

xargatha.name: Lethal Spin
xargatha.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. +3 ::attack_red:: Attack 
for each other enemy unit adjacent to you.

xargatha.name: Dominate
Devoted Followers
xargatha.description:
If you are adjacent to an enemy unit,
you may retrieve a discarded card.

xargatha.name: Rapid Thrusts
xargatha.description:
Target a unit in range. +1 ::range_red:: Range
for each enemy unit adjacent to you.
May repeat once on a different enemy hero.

xargatha.name: Final Embrace
xargatha.description:
**End of round:** Defeat an enemy melee
or ranged minion adjacent to you.
